mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM MPS WHERE TO_DATE(MPS_PLAN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND MRP_APPLY_STATUS IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MPS ( MPS_NO, CONTRACT_DETAIL_NO, MPS_PLAN_CLASSIFICATION, SALES_PLAN_NO, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, MPS_PLAN_DATE, SCHEDULED_END_DATE, UNIT_OF_MPS, DUE_DATE_OF_MPS, MPS_PLAN_AMOUNT, MRP_APPLY_STATUS, DESCRIPTION ) VALUES ( #{mpsNo},#{contractDetailNo},#{mpsPlanClassification},#{salesPlanNo},#{itemCode} ,#{itemName},#{mpsPlanDate},#{scheduledEndDate},#{unitOfMps},#{dueDateOfMps} ,#{mpsPlanAmount},#{mrpApplyStatus},#{description} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MPS SET MRP_APPLY_STATUS = #{mrpStatus} WHERE MPS_NO = #{mpsNo}
